Owner Name: Douglas Andrew Devitt & Sylvia May Devitt & Lori Anne Devitt
Public Remarks: Wow! 4.5 Acres on Barnston Island. One of the last places in BC where you still own the foreshore of Fraser River. 4.3 Acres inside Dyke. 0.2 acres outside Dyke on riverbank. Approx. 295 feet of river shore. Flat land. Currently rated as Organic land. 10 mins from Guildford Shopping Centre. Flat bare acreage. Because an Island, Barnston Island is not considered Surrey or Maple Ridge, but Greater Vancouver Regional District Rural Land. So minimal Zoning restrictions. Taxes paid to GVRD. 2017 taxes of only $21.32. School bus service to Fraser Heights schools. Ferry operates from 6am to midnight weekly, and 6am to 1am on Friday, Saturday and Sunday. Dyking tax $12/acre. Harken Towing leasing log booms approx. $2900/yr revenue.
